Description: Green glazed composition shabti of Tjanefer with a lappet-wig, a modelled face with a beard, crossed hands in relief holding two incised hoes and the cord of a seed-basket which hangs over the shoulder; there is a column of incised Hieroglyphs running from the waist to the feet and there is a back-pillar and a plinth beneath the feet.
Acquisition name: Donated by: Sir Augustus Wollaston Franks
